titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the Court at Greenewich the XXIIII. of May, 1591. By Geruase Babington Doctor of Diuinitie
titleStmt.author: Babington, Gervase, 1550-1610.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richard Field for Thomas Chard,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Running title reads: A sermon preached by D. Babington at the court.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
